parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks whether the object is (a subtype) of the given type. While main and alternative syntaxes support only '''CfgVehicles''', '''CfgAmmo''' and '''CfgNonAIVehicles''', alternative syntax 2 allows to specify any config, including [[missionConfigFile|mission config]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object [[isKindOf]] typeName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> typeName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value>  typeName1 [[isKindOf]] typeName2

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> typeName1: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> typeName2: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>s3</name>=<value>  typeName1 [[isKindOf]] [typeName2, targetConfig] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.47</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p41</name>=<value> typeName1: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p42</name>=<value> typeName2: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p43</name>=<value> targetConfig: [[Config]]

</value></part><part><name>r3</name>=<value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[isKindOf]] "Tank";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>"BMP2" [[isKindOf]] "Tank";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[currentWeapon]] [[player]] [[isKindOf]] ["Rifle", [[configFile]] >> "CfgWeapons"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[countType]], [[typeOf]], [[inheritsFrom]], [[configHierarchy]], [[ArmA_2:_CfgVehicles | Arma 2 CfgVehicles]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 23, 2007 - 16:34</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Kronzky|Kronzky]]</dt>
<dd class="note">This command can be used on the whole [[ArmA: CfgVehicles|hierarchical class tree]] (i.e. when checking a [[ArmA:_Vehicles#Wheeled|HMMWV]], one could test for "HMMWV50", "Car", "LandVehicle", etc., all of which would return [[true]].)</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on 16 Apr, 2008</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Dr_Eyeball|Dr_Eyeball]]</dt>
<dd class="note">It appears [[isKindOf]] is limited to the [[ArmA:_CfgVehicles|CfgVehicles]] branch of the class hierachy.<br>
So CfgWeapons, CfgMagazines, etc will return [[false]] for checks like:
 ("M9" isKindOf "Pistol") returns false
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on 8 Nov, 2009</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:WGL.Q|.kju]]</dt>
<dd class="note">In a2 [[isKindOf]] also works for CfgAmmo in addition to CfgVehicles: ("M_9M311_AA" isKindOf "MissileBase") returns true. NOT for CfgWeapons, CfgMagazines and others..
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on June 16, 2015 - 17:54 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:James|James]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In case you cannot use [[isKindOf]] because of the reasons stated, just use [[BIS fnc returnParents]] with class names as return value:
<code>_isKindOf = "Rifle" [[in]] [([[configFile]] >> "CfgWeapons" >> "BWA3_G36K"), [[true]]<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>]</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_returnParents]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>is true`</value></part></template></code>
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 6, 2015 - 22:21 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Basstard|Basstard]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In A3 [[isKindOf]] works well with CfgWeapons and CfgMagazines using the syntax from example 3.<br>
It should be prefered to James' solution as it performs more than 25x faster. Tested in debug console with the following code snippets:<br>
<code>bool = "CA_Magazine" in ([([[configFile]] >> "CfgMagazines" >> "HandGrenade"),true] [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_returnParents]]);  -->  0.12111ms</code>
<code>bool = "HandGrenade" [[isKindOf]] ["CA_Magazine", [[configFile]] >> "CfgMagazines"];  -->  0.00439453ms</code>
When checking in [[CfgVehicles]] the syntax from example 2 performs a little faster.
</dd>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ofpe</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
